alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON AND SALINE COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Strang, or 28 miles northwest of Fairbury, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fairbury, Crete, Wilber, Friend, Dorchester, De Witt, Plymouth, Western, Daykin, Jansen, Tobias, Swanton, Harbine, Swan Creek Reservoir Number 2, The Highway 41 and 15 South Junction, Swan Creek Wildlife Management Area, Alexandria State Recreation Area, Cub Creek Recreational Area, Crystal Springs Campground, and Walnut Creek Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
